name: Skin Enhance Non-Comedogenic Skin Tint Serum Foundation
about: What it is:A weightless, non-comedogenic tinted serum that plumps and smooths while delivering a sheer, skin-like finish..Coverage:Light.Finish:Radiant.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Sodium Hyaluronate: Visibly plumps and smooths fine lines..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:The innovative, non-comedogenic serum creates breathable coverage with a seamless, natural glow that is truly a u201cno makeupu201d look. For best results, apply with a brush to burst pigment spheres suspended within a skincare base. The sheer wash of color evens out all skin tones without clogging pores...Clinical Results:
ingredients: -Sodium Hyaluronate: Visibly plumps and smooths fine lines..-Squalane: 100 percent plant-derived moisturizing agent adds hydration..-Acetyl Tetrapeptide-2: Provides environmental protection...Water/Aqua/Eau, Hexyl Laurate, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Octyldodecanol, Squalane, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Jasminum Sambac Leaf Cell Extract, Mangostin, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-2, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Alcaligenes Polysaccharides, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Amodimethicone, Carbomer, Magnesium Chloride, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Propylene Carbonate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Glucose, Lysine, Caprylyl Glycol, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, [+/-: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Pump onto back of hand. .-Mix with a foundation brush to activate microencapsulated pigment spheres..-Blend gently onto face...Recycling Instructions:.-Wash any remaining product from bottle..-Place bottle, cap, carton, and insert into recycling bin. .-Place pump in trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product basically sits on my vanity because it is so bad. I wish I had returned it and had not given it so many chances. Even though itu2019s medium it looks so pale on my skin and separates so bad with my skincare. Itu2019s extremely drying as well. It makes my skin so tight.
